trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Pulshs Ooan yearns to harness the power of flame...
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_TODO_00<tab>Place the trilobite meat into the cookpot.
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_TODO_01<tab>Let the stew simmer.
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_TODO_02<tab>Take the stew from the cookfire.
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_TODO_03<tab>Offer the stew to the Ondo culinarian.
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the stew to Pulshs Ooan.
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_PULSHSOOAN_000_000<tab>Finless one, is it true that on the shhhore, your people treat your food with fire to make it last longer?

TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_PULSHSOOAN_000_001<tab>Ah hah, I thought so! You see, ever since the waters withdrew, our foodstuffs have become more prone to rot and decay. Something about exposssure to air, I sssuspect...

TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_PULSHSOOAN_000_002<tab>With this in mind, we thought we might try to mimic your fire-assisted methods. We prepared a “cookpot” which was cast into the sea, but despite our best efforts to replicate your techniques, the result was quite disssappointing.

TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_PULSHSOOAN_000_003<tab>As a finless one, surely you are more capable of making this so-called ssstew? If you might take this trilobite meat and place it into the cookpot as we obssserve, it would be most educational.

TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_PULSHSOOAN_000_004<tab>The others are gathered atop the rise to the eassst. You will forgive me for keeping my distance─I have yet to grow accussstomed to the heat of the flames...

TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_PULSHSOOAN_000_010<tab>Please take that trilobite meat to the others tending the pot and demonssstrate for them how a finless one prepares meat over fire. I will...obssserve from afar.
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_ONDOPEOPLE03581_000_011<tab>Ah, finless one! You are come to show us how ssstew is made?
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>You deposit the meat into the bubbling broth. All that remains is to wait...
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>The makeshift stew appears to have been cooked long enough. Whether or not it will meet with the Ondo's approval, however, remains to be seen...
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_ONDOPEOPLE03581_000_030<tab>Is the ssstew ready yet, finless one...?
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_ONDOPEOPLE03581_000_031<tab>Ahh! So hot it is, like the boiling currentsss near the deepwater vents!

TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_ONDOPEOPLE03581_000_032<tab>But it must be this hot, else the meat will ssspoil, yes? I see...so fearful of the heat were we that we did not consssider cooking it longer. But now we know.
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_ONDOPEOPLE03581_000_033<tab>Thank you for teaching us, finless one. Take with you a portion of the ssstew back to Pulshs Ooan that he may sssavor this taste for himself.
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_ONDOPEOPLE03581_000_035<tab>Pulshs Ooan must know the taste of this ssstew. Take to him that portion.
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_PULSHSOOAN_000_040<tab>Well? Were you able to educate the others, finless one?
TEXT_LUCKZJ018_03581_PULSHSOOAN_000_041<tab>How hot it is, yet delicious! To think such wonders could be born of deadly fire. Thank you for teaching us the proper methods.
